description: The artificially enhanced cyber-Newtype who pilots the mighty Psyco Gundam. The fourth product of the Earth Federation`s Murasame Newtype Lab, Four is a war orphan with no memory of her past, whose masters have promised to restore her lost memories if she performs to their satisfaction. Four`s opportunity to prove herself in battle comes when she is assigned to aid the Titans in their pursuit of the rebel transport plane Audhumla. However, her priorities are thrown into question by her developing rapport with AEUG pilot Kamille Bidan.
name: Four Murasame
